summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Growom Garden Hose Nozzle 4 Adjustable Spray Patterns Garden Sprayer Heavy Duty Metal Hose Nozzle with 3 Washers for Gardening, Car Washing, Pet Bathing and General Cleaning
Review Date: 2019/09/13
Store: Growom
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Growom', 'Finish Type': 'Polished', 'Material': 'Heavy,Metal', 'Handle Type': 'Lever', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 4.6 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
Review Text: This nozzle is super built to last. It’s rather heavy but I know it will withstand the much abuse. My only worry is we have hard water and sometimes that eats away at our nozzles over time. Great product that will last though!
Review Title: Super heavy duty
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Beachwaver Co. Dual Voltage, S1, White
Review Date: 2019/09/15
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'This ceramic, rotating curling iron provides easy, quality waves in minutes!', 'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'The Beachwaver Co.', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Product Dimensions': '15.75 x 1.75 x 2 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '817741020613', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/SB10T', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
Review Text: First off, I know it pricey for a curling iron but it actually does the trick and is pretty cool. You clip your hair in the bottom little clipper and I prefer the low speed and it winds your hair for you up the wand! It gets nice and hot and curls did stay well after hrs or wear in semi humid weather. Definitely takes a little getting use to but it’s pretty cool. You do need to take slightly smaller sections of hair to curl so the clipper can hold it but I really enjoyed using this!
Review Title: I was skeptical but this is super amazing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set
Review Date: 2020/02/05
Store: JPNK
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love these combs not only for myself but for my daughters hair. They are perfect for any hair length or texture as you have a set of 4 from wide tooth to fine tooth. They feel nice on the scalp and glide through hair easily. These are a great deal for 4 of these!
Review Title: Great detangler combs
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnesium Serum For Kids - All Natural Rub for Kids and Babies, Toxic Free + Free Magnesium Chart PDF
Review Date: 2020/02/07
Store: Raise Them Well
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Raise Them Well', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl. Oz', 'Flavor': 'Unflavored', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '853647007044', 'Manufacturer': 'Raise Them Well'}
Review Text: Unfortunately I didn't notice much different with this spray. I think it smells nice and it a great idea to calm kiddos but I fine essential oil rollers on the bottom of the feet to have more contact with the skin making them more effective.
Review Title: Didn't notice any difference
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material)
Review Date: 2020/02/29
Store: MIND UP
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was hopeful for this pick but disappointed. First off, it's a super flimsy and you can't use much pressure when pressing against teeth. Also, the pointed end that is supposed to clear put any food from between the teeth isn't pointed enough so you can't really get in there all the way. Last, because you cannot put enough pressure to scrape off gunk, it becomes useless.
Review Title: Way to flimsy
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Pack Soft Headband BEoffer Coral Fleece Women Makeup Spa Head Bands Turban Fashion Bow Bowknot Hairlace Headwear Wash Face Hair Holder Elastic Top Knot Bandage Girl Baby Hair Accessories 6 Colors
Review Date: 2020/03/15
Store: BEoffer
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Product Dimensions': '7.28 x 1.97 x 0.67 inches; 1.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BH-002', 'UPC': '799899729252'}
Review Text: These super cute headbands are perfect for washing you face at the end of the night, making sure all the hair stays out for your face, and when I am applying my sunscreen in the morning so it doesn't get in my hair. They are super soft and come in a variety of colors!!!
Review Title: Perfect for washing face
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hairdresser Scissors Set Hair Thinning Scissors Hairdressing Shears Set with Wipe Cloth,Grinding card, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Upgraded Professional Haircut Set black
Review Date: 2020/06/27
Store: Lyeiaa
Product Description: ['All-in-One Hair Cutting Kit :1 x Hair Scissor,1 x Grinding card,1 x Hair Razor Comb, 1 x Cleaning Cloth, 1 x Comb, 2 x Hairpin clips , 1 x Neck Duster. The hair cutting kit meets all your hair cutting and styling needs.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lyeiaa', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.94 x 4.09 x 1.54 inches; 12.73 Ounces', 'UPC': '303276761980', 'Manufacturer': 'Lyeiaa'}
Review Text: This kit is my favorite one I've purchased. I cut my kids and husband's hair and this is everything you will need! Comes in a nifty little case that holds it all together. The cape is perfect for minimizing hairs everywhere. The scissors and thinning sheers are super sharp and use with minimal effort. So far this is the best kit I am using and would recommend to anyone.
Review Title: All in one kit
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie
Review Date: 2020/07/08
Store: Winky Lux
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'}
Review Text: This pretty color goes on wet and dries down to a very pretty medium brown. I have light olive skin and found it very complementary to my skintone. Not too dark that it's a nighttime look but dark enough that it looks like I'm wearing something. Stays on pretty well and I will definitely be buying more
Review Title: Pretty neutral shade
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes
Review Date: 2020/07/10
Store: Eyenjoy
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'}
Review Text: I had to keep reapplying the magnetic eyeliner especially in the corners of my eyes where it maybe got wet from blinking. I didn't feel like I could go out without the eyeliner in my purse to reapply everything I had a mirror. To me that just too much work then and you might as well use regular lashes.
Review Title: Don't stay well
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz)
Review Date: 2020/07/14
Store: CIMIY
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
Review Text: We use aloe a lot in our house as my daughter is constantly scraping her knees. This aloe has a nice push too for easy use and it a pretty decent value size. No strong smell and dries fast. Great buy.
Review Title: Nice bottle for easy use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color
Review Date: 2020/09/06
Store: EagleKing
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: I used these bottles to make my own essential oil room sprays for the bathroom. They are the perfect smaller size to fit on the back of the toilet and last forever as you only need one or two sprays. Sprayer lasts well in addition to the pump. Amber color is perfect for keeping essential oils good for a long time! Great purchase!

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Aloe Hand Sanitizer 24 Pack Dearskin Aloe Vera Moisturizing Alcohol 75% Gel 2 Fl Oz/60ml Skin Care Natural Advanced Formula Alcohol Refreshing Moisturizing with Argine.
Review Date: 2020/11/18
Store: Dearskin
Product Description: ['24 Pack Dearskin Hand Sanitizer 60ml, 2 Fl Oz', 'Dearskin Hand sanitizer Kills 99.9% of the most common germs!', '- Clean and Refreshing Moisturizing;', '- Long-Lasting Antibacterial;', '- Easy to use, hard to waste; -', '75% Alcohol;', 'Drug Facts: Active ingredients: - Alcohol 75% v/v. Antiseptic. Use: Hand sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available. For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from or flame. Do not use: - In children less than 2 months of age. - On open skin wounds. When using this product keep out of eyes, and mouth. In case of contact with eyes, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs. These may be sings of a serious condition. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Directions: - Place enough product on hands to cover all surfaces. Rub hands together until dry. - Supervise children under 6 years of age when use this product to avoid swallowing. Other information: Store between 15-30C (59-86F). Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F). Inactive ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Carbomer, Arginine. Distributed by: Dearskin LLC, FL.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dearskin', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Travel Size, Moisturizer', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 4 x 4 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '850005863359', 'Manufacturer': 'Dearskin'}
Review Text: This hand sanitizer works great. It isn't too sticky and a little goes a long way. Great value for the price. So easy to use and love the high alcohol continent to keep germs away for myself and my family! Perfect for each family member to keep in their pocket!
Review Title: Love these little bottles
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Gardening and Home Outdoors**: Strong interest in durable, heavy-duty tools designed for gardening and cleaning, indicating a focus on quality and longevity in outdoor products.

2. **Hair Care and Styling**: Frequent purchases of hair styling tools and accessories, demonstrating a preference for innovative products that ease hair management, as well as a willingness to invest in quality items for family hair care.

3. **Skincare and Natural Products**: Regular selection of skin-friendly and organic skincare items, particularly those incorporating natural ingredients like aloe vera and essential oils, suggesting a focus on health and wellness.

4. **DIY and Customization**: Engagement in DIY practices, especially with essential oils and personal care products, implying a creative approach to self-care and a desire for personalized solutions.

5. **Family-oriented Purchases**: Multiple family-focused items, such as children's hair tools and protective skincare, highlighting a commitment to family well-being and multi-user products.

6. **Fashion and Aesthetics**: Interest in cosmetic products, including makeup and accessories, indicating a trend towards maintaining a polished appearance through vibrant colors and unique styles.

7. **Value-driven Choices**: Consistent preference for products that offer good value for money, demonstrating a balancing act between quality and affordability across various categories.

target_interaction.title: Not a winner
target_interaction.text: Had high hopes for this but it didn't work for me. I think the barrel itself it too big to really get good results. It was rather uncomfortable and honestly for the time it took to do it I could have just curled my hair.
